statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 2 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, time_in FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC, time_in ASC;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY date DESC, time_in ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 1002 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date ASC, time_in DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, TIME_FORMAT(time_in, '%h:%i %p') AS formatted_time_in, TIME_FORMAT(time_out, '%h:%i %p') AS formatted_time_out FROM attendance_records ORDER BY time_out DESC, date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM attendance_records GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, TIMEDIFF(time_out, time_in) AS total_work_hours FROM attendance_records WHERE date = CURDATE() ORDER BY total_work_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records;
SELECT record_id, employee_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_name = 'Morning Shift';
SELECT shift_id, shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records JOIN shifts ON attendance_records.record_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(time_out, time_in))/3600) AS total_hours FROM attendance_records GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 40;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT id, employee_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE shift_name = 'Morning Shift';
SELECT id, shift_name FROM Shifts ORDER BY shift_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM Schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE status = 'Absent';
SELECT employee_id, date FROM Schedules ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM Shifts WHERE end_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM Schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT a.employee_id, s.shift_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM Schedules s JOIN Attendance a ON s.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in_time FROM attendance WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_out_time FROM attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, shift_id, date FROM schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM attendance;
SELECT employee_id, date FROM attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, employee_name FROM schedules JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT shift_id, shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employees WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT schedule_id, date FROM schedules WHERE DATE(date)='2022-01-05';
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE start_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM schedules WHERE shift_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE start_time > '08:00:00' ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.department_id;
